channel.title: Desktops
channel.description:
Hey, I'm working on a project for my own online game (not going to tell much about it yet) and I'm looking for a few desktops (I got about 5000$ USD to spend on this project) for my game to be hosted on. Its going to be a browser game and I have already worked out all that stuff, but I need your guys opinions on this desktop. I have always had alien brand computers because they are normally top of the line but yeah, what do you guys think of this. (If you don't like it, please post why and maybe another type.)
http://configure.us.dell.com/dellstore/config.aspx?c=us&cs=19&l=en&s=dhs&kc=&oc=DPFOST1

item.title: Desktops
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=493726.msg3609816#msg3609816 date=1306458937]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=493726.msg3609792#msg3609792 date=1306456997]

Host your game on a server, not a desktop.

I don’t want to pay per month and my house has a very large basement that im building a room to host the desktops in until I need more space, measuring it out I can fit 20 desktops in it. I just want to get the best I can for the money.
[/quote]buy a decently sized server for ~1-2k usd ? (not sure about the specs or quality)

I want to have my files all hosted at my house, I have bought from a few hosting company’s in the past that ended up stealing work files from me and selling them online.
[/quote]i said buy one…

Dell

Dell PowerEdge Servers for Small and Enterprise Business | Dell United States

The latest generation Dell PowerEdge blade, rack and tower servers boost application performance and deliver industry-leading manageability.

something like that but i don’t know the best quality/specs[/quote]
Oh I thought you meant buy perm hosting from a site. Ill look into this thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Desktops
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=493726.msg3609791#msg3609791 date=1306456831]

Host your game on a server, not a desktop.

I don’t want to pay per month and my house has a very large basement that im building a room to host the desktops in until I need more space, measuring it out I can fit 20 desktops in it. I just want to get the best I can for the money.
[/quote]buy a decently sized server for ~1-2k usd ? (not sure about the specs or quality)[/quote]
I want to have my files all hosted at my house, I have bought from a few hosting company’s in the past that ended up stealing work files from me and selling them online.

Read full topic

[quote=“John459, post:4, topic:396555”]Host your game on a server, not a desktop.[/quote]Servers are desktops, just with more specialized specs.

item.title: Desktops
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]alienware isn’t top of shit
it’s dell with cool plastic and leds[/quote]Used to be. They’re decently competitive now.

You don’t need Alienware for a server, though. Their price is a lot because of their graphic functionality; servers obviously don’t use that at all.

Read full topic

item.description:
